title: Google App Launcher
name: gglappbtn
description: Simple access to Google Applications with a toolbar button
author: Mahesh Asolkar (asolkar@gmail.com)

preferences.name: applist
preferences.title: Apps in app drawer
preferences.description:
List 9 apps to be included in the app drawer. Apps in the list can be re-arranged in the drawer. Following are available apps to choose from:
  • gplus: Google+
  • gmail: Gmail
  • gcal: Calendar
  • gdoc: Docs
  • gdrv: Drive
  • gphotos: Photos
  • gmaps: Maps
  • gplay: Play
  • gytube: YouTube
  • gsheets: Sheets
  • gnews: News

Default set is:
  gplus,gmail,gcal,gdoc,gdrv,gphotos,gmaps,gplay,gytube

Note: If more than 9 apps are listed here, first 9 will be used.
